message: README.md: added direct download link to relased ZIP
Added build script for logos. Updated screenshot with new name.
Updated remaining unchanged references to old application name. Added VariableTreeItem for common behaviours. Created test for speedy renaming of variable definitions is large texts.
Added hyperlink model for inserting hyperlinks and selecting hyperlinks in text. Replaced commonmark with flexmark to get markdown AST nodes with relative offsets.
Removed redundant license information. Added injectable caret position marker to assist scrolling the preview pane. Removed inaccurate scrolling by pixel calculations.
Removed options. Started migration towards unified persistence.
Upgraded to Apache Commons Configuration 2.1. Fixed bug with settings. Load YAML files. Removed IDE-gone-mad imports.
Automatic reloading of external XSL template file.
Local file storage for preferences, to side-step issues with using a registry.
Updated documentation to simplify usage instructions.
Example showing R integration. Added default identity parser for unknown file types. Added Save As functionality. Removed System.out calls.
Updated readme with new application screenshot.
Update documentation and start migration to Java 14
Address IDE warnings, code formatting, bug fixes
Address build warnings, add help for R usage, update build instructions
Update README to point to example usages
Update README to point to executables
Move documentation images, start key casting integration
Reference Markdown Writer FX in README
Switch Markdown/TeX processing order, add screenshot
Move future features into issue tracker
Add app title image for docs
Change url to direct to download section
One step closer to the Source Code of Theseus
Maintain insertion order when saving/loading files
Replace file icons, add R/Rxml/Rmd vectors, update recent directory
